definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.name
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLBMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLLBMSINFOGeneralInformationPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.name)Specify a descriptive name for the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.description
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLBMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLLBMSINFOGeneralInformationPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.description)Specify a brief description of the managed system

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.location
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLBMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLLBMSINFOGeneralInformationPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.location)Specify the location of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.vendor
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLBMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLLBMSINFOGeneralInformationPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.vendor)Specify the vendor of the managed system.

definition.name: msysinfo.drv.ms.version
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLBMSINFO.idmresource.NOVLLBMSINFOGeneralInformationPrompts.gcv.dscr.msysinfo.drv.ms.version)Specify the version of the managed system.
